{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3154135,"name":"Kyle Swaidner","username":"kswaid","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/df788c/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-28T01:29:15.596Z","cooked":"

I’m trying to revive our old TI LaunchPad based co-driver station with a different arrangement of buttons, switches, and analog sticks but when I try to find any of the documentation or configuration files on the TI website all wiki links are broken as of 2021. This is specifically for the LaunchPad EXP430F5529LP that was provided to teams in 2015 (original chief thread). Does anybody know where this info might still be found? Alternatively, a pinout diagram for the 8x analog, 20 digital inputs, and 2 digital outputs configuration would provide what I need to wire everything up since I am pretty sure this configuration is currently flashed to the device.

GitHub

TI-FIRST

TI-FIRST has 2 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.
